hero.headline: Building data systems that work: error reduction, faster pipelines, and trails that survive your team
hero.subheadline: 8 years leading teams of 7+ engineers at National Bank of Canada, Orange, Onepoint. Delivered €130K+ annual savings through proven quality frameworks.
hero.projectOutcomes: €130K+ saved at National Bank • Zero downtime for 14M+ Orange customers • 75% client retention
hero.technicalInnovation: I build solutions that work. No fancy tech for tech's sake. Just reliable systems that save money and time.
credibilityIndicators: Saved National Bank €130K+/year fixing data quality issues
Zero downtime migration for 14M+ Orange customers
3 out of 4 consulting clients extended their contracts
Led teams of 7+ engineers at Canada's 6th largest bank
hero.professionalPositioning: I don't do buzzwords or fancy presentations. I fix what's broken, make it reliable, and move on. If your data systems are costing you money, I can probably help.
hero.savingsCalculation: Real example: National Bank saved €130K+/year when I reduced their data errors by 30% and sped up processing by 25%

work.title: Real Projects, Real Results
work.subtitle: 3 companies, 3 big problems, 3 successful outcomes
work.businessImpactStatement: No fluff. These are actual projects with real numbers from real companies.

bnc-analytical-foundation.description: Led team of 7 engineers to fix failing data systems at Canada's 6th largest bank. Built quality framework that reduced errors by 30% and saved €130K+ annually.
keyAchievements: Reduced data errors by 30%, saving €65K in labor costs annually
Increased processing speed by 25%, freeing 3 hours/day per engineer (€65K+ annual value)
Cut testing time by 40%, speeding up releases from days to hours
Team adopted my framework as the company standard

businessImpact.description: €130K+ annual savings: 30% fewer errors (€65K) + 25% faster processing (€65K)
Releases 40% faster - from days to hours

technicalInnovation: Automated testing reducing manual work by 40%

orange-zero-downtime.focusArea: Zero-downtime migration for Africa's largest telecom
orange-zero-downtime.description: Migrated 50+ critical data systems with zero downtime for Orange's 14M+ customers. Modernized outdated systems while keeping everything running 24/7.
keyAchievements: Migrated 50+ critical workflows with zero downtime - business kept running
20% productivity boost for engineering team through better tools
Modernized 5-year-old legacy systems without disrupting operations
Completed ahead of schedule with zero incidents
technicalInnovation: Custom tools increasing team productivity by 20%

onepoint-consulting.description: Delivered data audits and architecture design for 4 enterprise clients across banking, telecom, and tech. 3 out of 4 clients extended contracts based on results.
keyAchievements: Improved client system performance by 40% through better architecture
3 out of 4 clients renewed contracts - 75% retention rate
Trained client teams on sustainable data practices

businessImpact.description: 40% faster data processing across client systems
3 of 4 clients extended engagements based on delivered value
